alert.note: Alert for Butler; Seward (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Omaha (Eastern Nebraska and Southeastern Iowa - Omaha Valley)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 18 at 10:58PM CDT until April 18 at 11:15PM CDT by NWS Omaha
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1115 PM CDT FOR NORTHERN SEWARD AND SOUTH CENTRAL BUTLER COUNTIES... At 1057 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Bee, or 6 miles north of Seward, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...A COOP observer reported 1" hail in Utica at 10:49 PM. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Seward, Staplehurst, Garland, Bee, Ulysses, Goehner and Tamora. HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
